bordered.description: Toggles rendering of the border around the list

grid.description: The grid type of list. You can set grid to something like {gutter: 16, column: 4}

itemLayout.description: The layout of list, default is horizontal, If a vertical list is desired, set the itemLayout property to vertical

loading.description: Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the list are being fetched

pagination.description: Pagination config, hide it by setting it to false

split.description: Toggles rendering of the split under the list item

renderItem.description: Custom item renderer, slot="renderItem" and slot-scope="item, index"

rowKey.description: Specify the key that will be used for uniquely identify each element
